messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is located at the Dig Site?
Carl White and his team
You are a helpful assistant.
Why is shade preferable at the Dig Site?
It's still a hot summer day, despite not suffering the harmful effects of sunlight
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is the team leader Carl White that the investigators meet?
Carl White
You are a helpful assistant.
Why is Carl willing to give the investigators a sanitized version of what the team is doing?
He explains (honestly) that they have been sent into the woods to conduct geological surveys.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the reason for the deep blasting at the site?
They have found evidence of a potential deposit of platinum at this site
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the ultimate goal of Carl in showing the investigators around the site?
To lead the investigators into a trap
You are a helpful assistant.
Who leads the investigators to the fourth hut?
Carl
You are a helpful assistant.
Who are the bound prisoners being kept in a side room?
Jane Strong, Brian and Arthur Hall
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the location of the bound prisoners?
a side room
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the goal of the servants after the investigators are restrained and captured?
to lock the investigators in the dark hut until nightfall, then take them down to the water to become slaves to Turner's god.
You are a helpful assistant.
What will happen to the investigators if they are caught?
They will be locked in the dark hut until nightfall, when they will be taken down to the water to become slaves to Turner’s god.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where was Jane taken from when she was captured?
She was taken from the hideout in the dead of night where she had been kept hostage by the Harris gang.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where was Jane taken from?
the hideout in the dead of night
You are a helpful assistant.
What did the captives say one of them would do?
Become one with their new god
You are a helpful assistant.
What is happening to Arthur?
Arthur is crying.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the servants' goal regarding the captives?
They don’t want to harm their captives before nightfall.
